Greetings :-)

 

When I have an XML file open in XML explorer that has nodes with many attributes and I hover the mouse over an attribute to get the xpath for the attribute a tooltip pops up showing the XML node contents that blocks my entire view of the node. My suggestion would be to remove the tooltip pop up.

Just a quick update on this, there should be an update soon which will contain an option 'Format > Show Node Tooltips' which will shift the tooltip down below the cursor like you would normally expect. This has been bothering me as well.
